events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the wrong item being delivered.
Assigning this refund request to a customer support agent specializing in order issues.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached is a picture of the wrong product that was shipped to me.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid label for returning the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the prepaid label for return shipping.
Your refund has been processed and you should see the credit within 5-7 business days. The return label has been emailed to you.
We are following up to ensure your refund was received and that everything regarding the return went smoothly.
Since no further issues were reported, we have closed your refund case. Please contact us again if needed.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
